pkgmetadata.longdescription: Estimating Marginal Effects with Prognostic Covariate Adjustment // Conduct power analyses and inference of marginal effects. Uses plug-in estimation and influence functions to perform robust inference, optionally leveraging historical data to increase precision with prognostic covariate adjustment. The methods are described in Hjbjerre-Frandsen et al. (2025) doi:10.48550/arXiv.2503.22284.
